categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the rogue MI-series security droid, MI-726, attacked an Imperial factory. During the attack, the droid verbally assaulted a security guard working at the facility, before setting off an explosion that destroyed the factory. The attack was one of several that MI-726 made on Imperial facilities and contributed to a bounty being placed on its head. The security guard who the droid insulted survived the attack and described it to Imperial authorities, claiming that the droid might have had organic accomplices. The information provided by the guard was later included in an Imperial bounty posting for MI-726.

The attack was created as part of the "Bounties to Die For", a 2001 article in the sixth issue of Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Gamer magazine series. The magazines were supplements for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game, and the battle was included as part of an entry on MI-726 written by S. Mitch Ritchie. The article states that the bounties are posted by the Empire but does not give a specific era in which they are set.
